attribution.required_text: Data from WA Solar Feasibility Pack by Spatial.Properties. Individual layer attributions apply.
attribution.placement: visible in derived works and reports

constraints.description: This pack is for screening and early feasibility assessment ONLY.
constraints.rationale: Data resolution and currency not suitable for engineering design.

constraints.description: Grid capacity information is indicative signal only, not a connection guarantee.
constraints.rationale: Actual connection capacity subject to formal application and network operator assessment.

constraints.description: Aboriginal Cultural Heritage clearance required before any ground disturbance.
constraints.rationale: Legal requirement under WA Aboriginal Heritage Act.

layer_licenses.attribution: NASA Langley Research Center POWER Project
Department of Fire and Emergency Services WA

warranty.description: Data provided as-is without warranty of accuracy, completeness, or fitness for purpose.
